meanings.definition: The quality or state of being definitive.
meanings.sent1: Her definitivenesses in making decisions always impressed her colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The definitivenesses of the answer left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent3: His definitivenesses in choosing ice cream flavors was legendary among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The definitivenesses of the judge's ruling brought closure to the case.
meanings.sent5: The definitivenesses of the mountain peak against the sky was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The quality of being final or settled.
meanings.sent1: The definitivenesses of the contract put an end to any further negotiations.
meanings.sent2: The definitivenesses of the decision brought peace to the family.
meanings.sent3: The definitivenesses of the movie's ending left the audience satisfied.
meanings.sent4: The definitivenesses of the sunset marked the end of a beautiful day.
meanings.sent5: The definitivenesses of the closed door signaled the end of the meeting.

meanings.definition: The quality of being conclusive or decisive.
meanings.sent1: The definitivenesses of the test results confirmed the diagnosis.
meanings.sent2: The definitivenesses of the evidence led to a quick resolution.
meanings.sent3: The definitivenesses of the coin toss determined the winner.
meanings.sent4: The definitivenesses of her tone left no room for argument.
meanings.sent5: The definitivenesses of the judge's verdict settled the case once and for all.
